title: What are the major differences between the islands of Antigua and Barbuda? - Quora

response.answer_text: Size: Antigua 108 square miles VS Barbuda 62 square miles Barbuda has beautiful pink, white and pearl color sand VS Antigua has white and a mixture of pink and white Antigua is blessed with 365 beaches; one for everyday of the year whereas Barbuda may have about 12 - 15 giving you the opportunity of getting to know each one personally Antigua is a place for liming, partying , fetes and Service with excellent hotels offering exceptional service VS Barbuda is known for culture and it's laid back nature giving it the place for relaxing and rejuvenating your mind, body and soul

The most obvious difference would be that Antigua has a bigger population. The island of Antigua has about 82,000 people living on it.[1] There’s more to do there, as well.[2] Cruise ships, tourists, sailors—everyone goes to Antigua. Barbuda is also beautiful, but there isn’t as much to do there.  My own picture of Falmouth harbor, Antigua. Taken in late 2014 Footnotes[1] http://worldpopulationreview.com/countries/antigua-and-barbuda-population/[2] https://travel.usnews.com/Antigua/Things_To_Do/
